trans-unit.source: Represents a date in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表日期的日期<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A CalendarDay object represents a date in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: CalendarDay 物件所表示日期的日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: You can use this class in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event handler to programmatically access the properties of a date as it is rendered on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件處理常式加入上轉譯，以程式設計方式存取的日期屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to determine the properties of the day (such as whether the date is selectable, selected, today's date, or a weekend date) and programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您決定一天 （例如，日期是可選取，選取今天的日期或週末的日期） 的屬性，並以程式設計方式控制的外觀或行為的一天。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of CalendarDay, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 CalendarDay 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay>的新執行個體使用這個建構函式

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although this constructor is available, an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay> class is not typically created dynamically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個建構函式可供使用，雖然執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay>類別不通常會動態建立。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |Date|The value of the `date` parameter.| |DayNumberText|The value of the `dayNumberText` parameter.| |IsOtherMonth|The value of the `isOtherMonth` parameter.| |IsSelected|The value of the `isSelected` parameter.| |IsToday|The value of the `isToday` parameter.| |IsWeekend|The value of the `isWeekEnd` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |日期 |值`date`參數。 | |DayNumberText |值`dayNumberText`參數。 | |IsOtherMonth |值`isOtherMonth`參數。 | |IsSelected |值`isSelected`參數。 | |IsToday |值`isToday`參數。 | |IsWeekend |值`isWeekEnd`參數。 |

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object that contains the date represented by an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>物件，其中包含這個類別的執行個體所表示日期。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the date represented by an instance of this class is either a Saturday or a Sunday; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示此類別的執行個體所表示日期是星期六或星期日。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the date represented by an instance of this class is the current date; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示此類別的執行個體所表示日期是目前的日期。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the date represented by an instance of this class is selected on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示上選取了此類別的執行個體所表示日期<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控制項等控制項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the date represented by an instance of this class is in a month other than the displayed month on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示此類別的執行個體所表示日期已在一個月，顯示月份以外上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控制項等控制項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The day number for the date represented by this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別所表示日期的日數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the date represented by an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個類別的執行個體所表示日期。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Use the Date property to programmatically determine the date represented by an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 用於以程式設計方式判斷此類別的執行個體所表示日期的日期屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object that contains the date represented by an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>物件，其中包含這個類別的執行個體所表示日期。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您以程式設計方式控制的外觀或行為的日子，根據此值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string equivalent of the day number for the date represented by an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體所表示日期的日數字相等的字串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Use the DayNumberText property to determine the string equivalent of the day number for the date represented by an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷此類別的執行個體所表示日期的日數的對等字串使用 DayNumberText 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您以程式設計方式控制的外觀或行為的日子，根據此值。

trans-unit.source: The string equivalent of the day number for the date represented by an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 等於這個類別的執行個體所表示日期的日數的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the date represented by an instance of this class is in a month other than the month displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個類別的執行個體所表示日期是否在一個月中顯示的月份以外<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsOtherMonth property to programmatically determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class is in a month other than the month displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式判斷此類別的執行個體所表示日期是否在一個月中顯示的月份以外使用 IsOtherMonth 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day based on this value.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您以程式設計方式控制的外觀或行為，這個值為基礎的當日。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the date represented by an instance of this class is in a month other than the month displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>這個類別的執行個體所表示日期是否在一個月中顯示的月份以外<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控制項等控制項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the date represented by an instance of this class can be selected in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可以在選取此類別的執行個體所表示日期<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsSelectable property to specify or determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class can be selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsSelectable 屬性來指定，或決定是否可以在選取此類別的執行個體所表示日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically control the appearance behavior of the day, based on this value.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您以程式設計方式控制為一天的外觀行為根據此值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the date can be selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以選取的日期。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the date represented by an instance of this class is selected in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否在選取此類別的執行個體所表示日期<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsSelected property to programmatically determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式判斷是否要將這個類別的執行個體所代表的日期選取中使用的 IsSelected 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您以程式設計方式控制的外觀或行為的日子，根據此值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the date represented by an instance of this class is selected in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在中選取此類別的執行個體所表示日期<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控制項等控制項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the date represented by an instance of this class is the same date specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個類別的執行個體所表示日期是否為所指定的相同日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate*>屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsToday property to programmatically determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class is the same date specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsToday 屬性來以程式設計方式判斷此類別的執行個體所表示日期是所指定的相同日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您以程式設計方式控制的外觀或行為的日子，根據此值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although the date specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate%2A> property is usually the system date on the server, it is possible to change it, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 雖然所指定的日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate%2A>屬性是通常在伺服器上的系統日期，可以變更它，如有必要。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the date represented by an instance of this class is the same date specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此類別的執行個體所表示日期是所指定的相同日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate*>屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控制項等控制項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the date represented by an instance of this class is a either Saturday or Sunday.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個類別的執行個體所表示日期是否為星期六或星期日。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsWeekend property to programmatically determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class is either a Saturday or a Sunday.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式判斷此類別的執行個體所表示日期是星期六或星期日使用 IsWeekend 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您以程式設計方式控制的外觀或行為的日子，根據此值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the date represented by an instance of this class is either a Saturday or a Sunday; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此類別的執行個體所表示日期是星期六或星期日。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
